DOC.brief_summary: The main objective compare fibrinolytic strategy interventional strategy initiate early possible , preferably pre-hospital phase , respect resolution ST-segment elevation 120 minute inclusion Thrombolysis In Myocardial Infarction ( TIMI ) flow grade evaluate mandated coronary angiography 5 7 day inclusion .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Between Thrombolysis Primary Percutaneous Coronary Intervention ( PCI ) Treat ST-Segment Elevation Myocardial Infarction
DOC.detailed_description: Patients fibrinolytic group receive intravenous injection 30 mg enoxaparin follow subcutaneous injection 1 mg/kg body weight every 12 hour hospital stay . Patients invasive group give intravenous injection enoxaparin ( 0.75 mg/kg body weight ) abciximab intravenous bolus ( 0.25 mg/kg body weight ) follow 12 hour infusion ( 10 microg/minute ) . Secondary outcome measure death , myocardial infarction stroke alone composite 30 day . Data use health care resource , loss production health-related quality life collect one year . Cost-effectiveness determine compare cost quality-adjusted survival .
DOC.criteria: Patients present within 6 h onset chest pain last 30 min significant STsegment elevation ECG . BP > 180/110 Known bleed disorder Cardiogenic shock CPR > 10 min Ongoing anticoagulant therapy Renal insufficiency Weight > 120 kg
